issue.title: affine_on has no specification for the default

discussion.p: The wording of affine_on doesnt have a specification for the default implementation. For other algorithms the default implementation is specified.

The intention for affine_on was to all optimisation/customisation in a way reducing the necessary scheduling: if the implementation can determine if a sender completed already on the correct execution agent it should be allowed to avoid scheduling. A specification should provide enough lattitude to allow that.
Set priority to 2 after reflector poll.

resolution.p: Add a new paragraph to the specification of affine_on in providing a specification for the default implementation:

p.ins: -6- Let sndr and env be subexpressions such that Sndr is decltype((sndr)). If sender-for<Sndr, affine_on_t> is false, then the expression affine_on.transform_sender(sndr, env) is ill-formed; otherwise, it is equivalent to:
except that sch is only evaluated once.
